summary: An ordinance relating to the franchise granted to the Seattle and Montana Railroad Company, a corporation, its successors and assigns, by Ordinance No. 18031 (as amended), granting the request of the Great Northern Railway Company, a corporation the present owner of said franchise, for additional franchise rights of way than therein specified; amending Section 2 of said Ordinance No. 18031 (as amended) with a view to said additions being granted; and providing for the acceptance by said Railway Company of said franchise as so modified.
